author: Steven Wright
text: Right now I'm having amnesia and deja vu at the same time. I think I've forgotten this before.

author: Bob Newhart
text: I don't like country music, but I don't mean to denigrate those who do. And for the people who like country music, denigrate means 'put down'.

author: Jimmy Carr
text: I saw that show, 50 Things To Do Before You Die. I would have thought the obvious one was 'Shout For Help'.
